description: OfficeReader-MCP Settings - Configure document format detection and processing

imageOptimization.description: Automatically optimize extracted images for better performance

notes: This file configures which document formats Claude Code should use MCP for recognition
autoDetectFormats: When true, automatically detects and uses MCP for supported formats
customFormats: Array of custom file extensions to handle (requires implementation)
Modify this file using: console.bat (Windows) or ./console.sh (Linux/macOS)
